name: mpe
description: Next generation MIDI for the web
author: Oscar Dub <oscar@roli.com>

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run compile
scripts.build:sandbox: npm run clean && npm run compile:dev
scripts.docs:documentation-js: documentation build ./src/*/index.js --config docs/documentation.yml --theme docs/_theme --format html --shallow --github --name mpe.js --output docs/dist
scripts.docs:build: npm run docs:clean && npm run docs:documentation-js && cp docs/CNAME circle.yml docs/dist/ && cp lib/mpe.min.js docs/dist/assets
scripts.docs:serve: npm run docs:build && pushd docs/dist && python -m SimpleHTTPServer 8001 && popd
scripts.docs:deploy: npm run docs:build && git-directory-deploy --directory docs/dist --branch gh-pages
